import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { GlobalContext } from '../../context/GlobalState' import Profile from '../../components/profile' import Projects from '../../components/projects' import TitleHover from '../../components/title-hover' const Main = () => { const { state } = useContext(GlobalContext) const { features } = state const { openMessagePopup, openProfileCard, openProjectsCard, isLoading } = features return (
) } export default Main
